name: itsukaita
author: kazunii_ac

sections.description:
記事をいつ書いたかを分析するプラグインです。下記のような分類で記事数などの表を表示します。詳しい説明は http://accountingse.net/2013/02/638/ に書いてます。 * 曜日毎 * 時刻毎 * 平日休日毎 * 曜日・時刻毎 * 平日休日・時刻毎 * 記事作成にかけた時間 * 生データ（table） * 生データ（csv）

This is plug-in which analyzes when posts were written. Tables, such as the number of posts, are displayed by the following classifications.
* by day of week * by hour * by holiday or not * by day of week and hour * by holiday or not and hour * by spent time * raw data (table) * raw data (csv)
sections.installation:
1. Upload itsukaita to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
